item.title: The Bottle returns to Camborne
item.author: Harry Allingham,
item.description: The Royal School of Mines made the long seven-hour journey down to Newquay for the 116th Bottle Match against Camborne School of Mines. Although the journey was long, it was made somewhat more enjoyable by the numerous games of chase the ace played. The memory of the loss two years ago and lodge 15 â€¦
